mapper.select: select count(user_acct) from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0 and user_acct = #{userAcct}
select count(phone) from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0 and phone = #{phone} and role = 4
select count(invite_code) from t_info_store where is_delete = 0 and invite_code = #{inviteCode}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_id, user_acct, user_name, user_password, sex, phone, mail, idcard, role, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version, user_image) values (#{userId}, #{userAcct}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, 4, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0, #{userImage} )
insert into t_info_client (user_id, invite_code, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version ) values (#{userId}, #{inviteCode}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0 )
